txt.en: Branches and deer can be found in the woods east of Crithost.\n\nYou should obtain some woods for repairing barricades and deer hides for making slings for the wounded.
Ceveneth can be found in the hall of Crithost.\n\nYou should speak with Ceveneth.
'You are most generous with your time. I shall put these supplies to good use around the village, my friend. You can count on me to help those in Crithost as much as I can.'

'If you have a moment, I am in need of supplies. I need more deer hides for making slings and casts for the wounded.\n\n'Also, I could use more wood to construct additional barricades for Crithost. Do you think you could gather some for me? There are some woods east of here that should have what I am looking for.'
Ceveneth is in need of supplies if she is to continue to help repair the villages defences and to care for the wounded.
